description.en:
How long will you stay in the game?

The last thing Kei and Masaru remember was being struck dead by a subway train while saving the life of a drunken bum. What a waste! And yet somehow they're still . . . alive? Or semi-alive? Maybe it's reanimated . . . by some kind of alien orb with a nasty message . . . "Your lives are over. What you do with your new lives is up to me!" And what this orb called "Gantz" intends to do with their lives is make them play games of death, hunting all kinds of odd aliens, along with a bunch of other ordinary citizens who've recently met a tragic semi-end. The missions they embark upon are often dangerous. Many die-and die again.

---
Links: 
* Alternative [official raw](https://www.shueisha.co.jp/books/search/search.html?titleauthor=GANTZ+%E3%82%AB%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BC%E7%89%88&digital=1)

altTitles.ja: パパのいうことを聞きなさい

description.en:
The story is about the daily life of a college freshman in the Literature Department of Tama University. He and his sister grew up on their own together after their parent's departure, but he decided to start living by himself when she got married to a man with two daughters from previous marriages. Shocked by their marriage, he attempted to distance himself from the family, leaving home before his sister gave birth to the man's third child. Approximately 3 years later he was asked by his sister to visit and babysit the girls…  
While he was looking after the girls, the plane which their parents were on went missing. He decided to take with him his three nieces (aged 14, 10 and 3 years old), resulting in the four of them sharing his tiny apartment.
description.ru: Иcтория повествует о девятнадцатилетнем японском студенте по имени Юта Сегава. Он в раннем возрасте лишился родителей, поэтому воспитанием занималась его старшая сестра. Несколько лет назад она вышла замуж за средних лет человека, у которого уже было две дочери от предыдущего брака и переехала жить к нему. Однаджы сестра и ее муж отправились в путешествие, а значит, Юте придется присматривать за уже тремя племянницами - четырнадцатилетней цундере Сорой, ученицей средней школы и мастерицей в готовке, которая к тому же внешне подозрительно кого-то напоминает, десятилетней Миу, вредной блондинкой с русскими корнями, и совсем маленькой Хиной, которая ходит в детский сад. Но случается так, что самолет с родителями сестер пропадает без вести… Что ж, придется Юте и трем девочкам как-то уживаться в его скромной комнатушке три на четыре метра.

description.en:
A girl who dreams one day, a woman who loves one day. Now I'm a wife and mother of two.

My dreams were crushed by reality, and the memories of love were too short to comfort her.

Her ordinary life, or her..."The Great"

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

description.en:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

altTitles.ja: 死の病に蝕まれた俺だが謎の最強能力が覚醒した

description.en: Terminally ill lad, after losing his family in an incident, finds out that hidden behind the disease is an extraordinary power. While pursuing the truth behind his family's death, he himself gets dragged further down the mysterious, dark abyss…
description.ru: Смертельно больной парень, потеряв семью в результате происшествия, обнаружил, что скрытая за болезнью была необычайная сила. Преследуя правду о смерти своей семьи, он сам того не замечая переходил на темную сторону этого мира ...

description.en: Some children are raised in the hands of Kwak No, After establishing a Disciple-Master relationship, the children dream of their own dreams by practicing martial arts and walking in that path to become masters. In order to make a living, Kwak No always had to leave his seat, and Seon-yu, the eldest of the children, has to take care of the Children, and He’ll be the Great Master.
description.ko:
삼류 낭인 곽노의 손에 거둬진 아이들.

사제관계를 맺고 아이들은 어설프게나마
무공과 보법 수련을 하며 각자의 꿈을 꾼다.

먹고살기 위해 곽노는 늘 자리를 비워야 했고,
아이들 중 맏이인 선유는 사제들을 돌봐야 한다.

그는 대사형大師兄이다.

altTitles.ja: 柚子川さんは、察して欲しい。

altTitles.zh-hk: 柚子川同學想讓我察覺。

description.en: Kushima-kun has just started going out with his classmate Yuzukawa Kururi. But Yuzukawa-san is not good at expressing her emotions, so she wants Kushima-kun to understand her feelings...?  This is a new kind of romantic comedy about two people who are "already dating" instead of "not together yet."
description.pt-br: Kushima acaba de começar a sair com sua colega de classe Yuzugawa Kururi. Yuzukawa não é boa em expressar suas emoções, então ela deseja que Kushima seja mais empática com seus sentimentos. Essa história é sobre um menino que quer entender e uma menina que quer ser entendida.

description.en: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
description.pt-br: Devido à Expansão da Tecnologia, as bruxas que eram amigas do povo se tornaram desnecessárias. Humanos, que temiam o poder não científico, começam uma caça às bruxas… E um menino humano que teve sua amada bruxa morta, se torna o “Mago da Vingança”.

title.en: My Son, Quickly Rely On Your Father's Prestige

altTitles.en: Son, Put Your Father To The Test
My Son Quickly Rely On Your Father's Prestige

altTitles.ja: 親心チートが無敵すぎる件

description.en: Qin Chuan transmigrated into a mysterious fantasy world. Not only did he gain a son, Qin Zi, for free, but also a cheatcode—a system that made him stronger every time his son caused trouble. After discovering that Qin Zi was a weakling with immense plot armor, Qin Chuan started on an endless journey to troll his son…

title.en: The Heavenly Demon Became an Idol

altTitles.en: The Heavenly Demon Becomes an Idol

description.en:
One day, a handsome man dressed in martial arts attire appeared in front of Manager Jeom So-Eui of the martial arts idol group 'Noble Alliance'. Introducing himself as 'The Heavenly Demon, Wi Hwajin', the man abruptly declared his intention to become an idol. Jeom So-Eui tried to pass this problem to the martial arts fanatic CEO of K-tsch, the agency of 'Noble Alliance', but the suspiciously wealthy martial arts enthusiast decided to let the Heavenly Demon join 'Noble Alliance'.

The Heavenly Demon, who claimed to represent the righteous faction, entered 'Noble Alliance'! However, there is a hidden motive behind the Heavenly Demon joining 'Noble Alliance' that even Jeom So-Eui doesn't know about....

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: The Heavenly Demon Lord Who Doesn't Want to Level Up

description.en:
"Jin Yuseong, the absolute master of the Middle Kingdom, found life too boring. 'I must be crazy. Just unifying the martial world…'"
"'I should have just been a farmer.'"
"'No, I wish I wasn't born at all.'"
"In 'The Heavenly Demon Lord Who Doesn't Want to Level Up,' one day, he encounters a gate… And upon passing through it, a new world unfolds."
"Jin Yuseong, the top martial deity and leader of the Celestial Demon Cult, arrives in Korea.

title.en: Mujikaku na Tensai Shoujo wa Kizukanai

altTitles.ja: 無自覚な天才少女は気付かない

altTitles.zh-hk: 毫無自覺的天才少女並沒有發現

altTitles.en: A Genius but She Doesn't Know It
The Oblivious Genius Girl Doesn't Notice

description.en:
She is a genius in all fields of magic, swordsmanship, alchemy, domestic affairs, music, painting, and novels?! She was able to do anything. However, she always tried not to be selfish, and decided to run away from home...! She is now an adventurer in a new world due to a chance encounter. Liliane unknowingly demonstrates all her talents...?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3032hc)

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid Official Guidebook

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン公式ガイドブック メイドラ大全

description.en:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!

altTitles.th: slave B นักรบทาส

description.en:
This is a world whose peace was destroyed by the Shadow Lord, ‘Secneum’. ‘Niro’ is a half-elf, half-human boy who lost his parents as a baby and was adopted by a slave couple. In this world, slaves are not treated as humans. Since Niro’s adoptive parents are slaves, they are mistreated and eventually lose their lives. Now Niro is alone once more, and must shoulder the burdens of his family and do whatever is takes to protect his two younger siblings. If Niro wants to escape this fate, there is only one thing he can do. He must graduate from the academy, ‘Excanum’ just like the current Emperor, ‘Muren’ who was once a slave!

description.fr:
Il n'est rien, il veut tout. Enfant esclave, il vivait heureux avant que ses deux parents ne se fassent assassiner par un maître jaloux ! Responsable de ses deux jeunes soeurs à seulement 13 ans, il essaie d’intégrer une prestigieuse école de magie qui les sauverait de leur condition. Cherchant à impressionner le roi pour y accéder, il échoue totalement et se retrouve finalement dans une mine infestée de monstres. Mais son courage et sa détermination le font remarquer. Et il intègre la prestigieuse école : Excanum !

奴隷に拾われたハーフエルフのニーロ。 両親から愛されて育つも両親は無残な死に方をする。 奴隷の身分から脱却するため、ニーロは皇帝ミュレンが卒業した戦士・魔法使い養成学校「エクスカヌーム」に入学する。 不屈の精神を持つニーロの成長と冒険の物語。

description.ko:
악신 '세크네움'에 의해 평화가 깨져버린 세계. 인간과 엘프 사이에서 태어난 '하프 엘프' 종족인 '니로'는, 갓난 아기일 때 부모를 잃고 인간 노예 부부에 의해 거두어진다. 노예는 사람 취급을 받지 못하는 세상에서 자라며 니로는 아버지와 어머니 모두 억울하게 잃고 어린 두 동생을 책임지는 가장의 역할까지 떠안게 된다. 지옥같은 노예 신분에서 벗어나 어린 두 동생을 지킬 수 있는 방법은 오직 하나. 노예 출신의 현 황제 '뮤렌'이 졸업한 학교, '엑스카눔'을 졸업하는 것 뿐! 하지만 노예의 신분인 니로가 '엑스카눔'에 입학하는 길은 보이질 않는데... 니로는 과연 절망에서 벗어나 '엑스카눔'에 들어갈 수 있을까.

Ниро родился в мире, гармония которого была нарушена Повелителем Теней "Секнеоном". В младенчестве полуэльфа приютила пара рабов, но через несколько лет они умерли, и мальчик остался сиротой. Теперь Ниро предстоит защитить свою маленькую семью.
Чтобы снять клеймо раба, юноша должен окончить академию "Эксканум", подобно нынешнему императору, который в прошлом тоже был рабом.

description.zh:
尼洛从小被收养，当养父母意外身亡，幼小的尼洛被迫承担起抚养双胞胎妹妹的重任。为了改变奴隶身份，尼洛用魔法算计了梅兰国王，却被判流放矿山，与妹妹们分离。在矿山苦练剑法，立了大功，获得了去贵族学校上学的机会的尼洛…在学校会遇到什么困难？他何时才能与妹妹们团聚？最终他又能否改变奴隶身份

description.pt-br: Em um mundo em que a paz foi destruída pelo Governante das Sombras, ‘Secneum’. ‘Niro’, um meio-elfo e meio-humano que perdeu seus pais quando ainda era um bebê, foi adotado por um casal de escravos. Nesse mundo, escravos não são considerados humanos. Como os pais adotivos de Niro são escravos, eles sofrem maus tratos constantemente até perderem suas vidas. Agora, Niro está sozinho novamente e deve suportar o peso de sua família e fazer o que for necessário para proteger seus irmãos caçulas. Se Niro quiser fugir do mesmo destino que seus pais, só há uma saída, se graduar na academia ‘Excanum’, igual ao imperador atual, ‘Muren’ que um dia também foi um escravo!
description.zh-hk:
世界的和平遭到邪神「塞科內恩」破壞。

人類和妖精生下的「半妖精」——「尼洛」
在襁褓時期便失去雙親，
由一對人類奴隸夫妻收養。

尼洛生長在一個奴隸不被當人看的世界，
在痛失雙親以後，
肩負起照顧兩名年幼妹妹的重責大任。

只有一個方法能讓他擺脫奴隸身分、保護兩個妹妹，
那就是從奴隸出身的現任皇帝
「梅蘭」的母校「艾斯卡儂」畢業!

只不過，身為奴隸的尼洛似乎找不到
進入「艾斯卡儂」就讀的辦法...

他究竟能不能擺脫絕望，成功進到「艾斯卡儂」呢?

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%B6%85%E5%A5%B4%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84/86)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647954)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74286)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Slave-B)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/slave_B_%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AA/7)

title.en: The Villainous Duke's Daughter's Special Method of Growing Rice

altTitles.ko: 악역 공작 영애의 특별한 쌀 재배법

description.en: When you transmigrate into a novel as the villainess destined to die, there are different ways to survive: flirting with the male lead, learning to fight, or finding happiness elsewhere—but not Erica! She has decided to become a successful rice farmer just like in her past life! What follows is an epic (and rather surreal) quest to find the last rice seeds in the world, tame a giant rabbit magic beast, recruit magicians to water the fields, and—Wait, did she just turn the Holy Sword into a hoe?!

April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

title.en: I'll Try to End the Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Will Try to End the Male Lead
I'm Going to Kill the Male Lead

altTitles.ja: 男主人公を殺す筋書きを描いてみます

altTitles.vi: Tôi Sẽ Giết Chết Nam Chính

description.en:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
description.ko:
로판 소설을 읽고 몸이 아파오던 나 권진하.

여주인공 엘비가 느끼는 감정과 감각이 모두 연결되어버렸다.

끔찍한 통증과 슬픔에 병원까지 찾아갔지만 몸에는 이상무.

결국 소설 작가에게 메일을 보냈다.

제발 쓰레기 남주가 여주 좀 그만 괴롭히게.

하지만 메일을 보냈더니 사이다 답장은커녕….

“일은 똑바로 해야지, 엘비.”

소설 속 엘비에게로 빙의해버렸다.

빙의하자마자 뺨을 올려붙이는 남주를 보고 든 생각은 하나뿐.

남주? 죽여버리면 그만이지.

altTitles.th: จิฮายะ กลอนรักพิชิตใจเธอ

description.en:
Chihaya is a girl in the sixth grade, still not old enough to even know the meaning of the word zeal. But one day, she meets Arata, a transfer student from rural Fukui prefecture. Though docile and quiet, he has an unexpected skill: his ability to play competitive karuta, a traditional Japanese card game. Chihaya is struck by his obsession with the game, along with his ability to pick out the right card and swipe it away before any of his opponents. However, Arata is transfixed by her as well, all because of her unbelievable natural talent for the game. Don't miss the first volume in this story of adolescent lives and emotions playing out in the most dramatic of ways.

---
  
- **Won the 2nd Manga Taisho Award in 2009** 
- **Won the 35th Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2011**
  


---

**Official Websites:**   
- [Live-Action Movies](http://chihayafuru-movie.com)  
- [Chihayafuru Charity Fund Info](https://chihayafund.com/)  
- [Chihayafuru Charity Fund Store](https://chihayafund.stores.jp/)
description.ja: まだ“情熱”って言葉さえ知らない、小学校６年生の千早(ちはや)。そんな彼女が出会ったのは、福井からやってきた転校生・新(あらた)。おとなしくて無口な新だったが、彼には意外な特技があった。それは、小倉百人一首競技かるた。千早は、誰よりも速く誰よりも夢中に札を払う新の姿に衝撃を受ける。しかし、そんな新を釘付けにしたのは千早のずば抜けた「才能」だった……。まぶしいほどに一途な思いが交差する青春ストーリー、いよいよ開幕!!
description.es-la:
Chihaya, un estudiante de 6º curso de primaria conoce a Arata, un estudiante transferido de Fukui, es un chico dócil y tranquilo pero, tiene una habilidad asombrosamente especial y es en el juego Ogura Hyakunin Isshu Karuta. Chihaya está sorprendida por la forma en que Arata pasa las cartas más rápido que nadie, y por lo absorto que está en el juego más que nadie. Pero, Arata está más embelesado por el inmenso "potencial" de Chihaya. Sus sentimientos se unen de forma radiante en esta historia de juventud.
___
- Ganó el 2º Premio Manga Taisho en 2009. 
- Ganó el 35º Premio Kodansha Manga en la categoría shoujo en 2011.
description.pt-br: Por toda sua vida, o sonho de Chihaya era ver sua irmã se tornar a melhor modelo do Japão... Isso até que o aluno transferido quieto e modesto chamado Arata lhe explica que um sonho é algo que você mesmo deve perseguir. Arata pratica uma versão competitiva do jogo de cartas tradicional Japonês (conhecido como Hyakunin Isshu) de um jeito que Chihaya nunca tinha visto antes. Após substituir Arata em uma partida, Chihaya desperta uma paixão pelo jogo. Agora Chihaya quer se tornar a número um no mundo, a Rainha de Karuta.

title.en: Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchi-chuu!

altTitles.ja: おひとり様には慣れましたので。婚約者放置中！

altTitles.ja-ro: Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchichuu!

altTitles.en: Since I've Gotten Used to Being Alone, I'm Ignoring My Fiancé!

altTitles.zh-hk: 已經習慣一個人了。訂婚對象放置中！

altTitles.zh: 已经习惯一个人了。订婚对象放置中！

description.en: Countess Nicole's fiancé, Chaos, is always by his childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ​​being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!

title.en: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers

altTitles.ko: 누가 우리 오빠들 좀 말려 주세요

description.en:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Since I don't know about it, should we part ways, Your Majesty?

description.en:
Due to a carriage accident, Lumiere suffers from amnesia. 
While searching for her memories, she discovers a warning in her diary.

[Do not fall for him.]

At that time, a man claiming to be her lover appears.
“I know everything about you, even the parts you don't know yourself.”

This man, who doesn't exist in her memories.
But she finds herself increasingly attracted to him…

… Were we really lovers? Why did we break up?
Is approaching the truth really the right thing for me?
description.ko:
마차 사고로 인해 기억상실증에 걸린 르미에.
기억을 찾기 위해 본 일기장에서 경고를 발견한다.

[그를 사랑해선 안 돼.]

그때, 그녀의 연인이었다고 주장하는 남자가 찾아왔다.
"난 당신 스스로도 모르는 부분까지 전부 다, 알고 있으니까."

분명 기억 속엔 존재하지 않는 그.
하지만 그에게 점점 끌리는 자신을 발견하는데...

…진짜 우린 연인이었을까? 왜 헤어진 걸까?
진실에 다가서는 것이, 정말로 나를 위한 일이 맞을까?

title.en: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef

description.en:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!
description.id:
Woojin menyadari kehidupan masa lalunya melalui insiden Monster Gate.
Dia adalah… Heavenly Demon yang menaklukan Dataran Tengah!
Bahkan ketika dia adalah Heavenly Demon, dia memiliki mimpi yang tidak dapat dia capai…
Dia pasti akan mencapainya kali ini.

Impiannya adalah menjadi chef!

title.en: I'm Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius

description.en: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious (?) friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...

Takahashi met Nanase, a beautiful and seemingly innocent woman, on a dating app. They were steadily growing closer in their relationship until one day, when he goes to Nanase's house, he finds a shocking sight...?
description.vi: Takahashi đã gặp được Nanase, một cô gái dễ thương và trong sáng thông qua ứng dụng hẹn hò. Quan hệ của cả hai ngày càng tiến triển một cách tốt đẹp rồi bỗng dưng một ngày nọ Takahashi được Nanase mời tới nhà mình chơi và chứng kiến một cảnh tượng bất ngờ.

description.en:
"Never forgive me."
Margret, who was brutally murdered by her lover, is reborn 7 years later as 'Meg'. Will 'Meg', who doesn't know anything about the world, be able to acclimate well into her new life...? A story uncovering the truth behind her death and the growing love between the characters!
description.fr:
Terriblement assassinée par son amant, Margaret renaît sous le nom de Mag sept ans plus tard et vit une nouvelle vie.

Mag, qui ne connaissait pas le monde, pourra-t-elle s'adapter à sa nouvelle vie ?
description.ko:
"저를 용서하지 마세요."
 
사랑하는 연인에게 끔찍하게 살해당한 마가렛은
7년 후 '매그'로써 다시 태어나 새로운 삶을 살아간다.
 
세상 물정 모르던 '매그'는 새로운 삶을 잘 적응해 나갈 수 있을까...?
그녀의 죽음에 얽힌 진상과 인물들의 성장 러브 스토리!

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

description.en: The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjō and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gokū, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.
description.ja:
真の救済が記されてるという経典を得るため、孫悟空・猪八戒・沙悟浄を共にし、天竺を目指す三蔵法師。

その道のりで襲いかかる試練が
・・・・・・・・全部エロい。

仏の道に生きる三蔵にとっては貞操を失うこと、それ即ち死。果たして三蔵法師は煩悩に打ち克ち、貞操を守り抜けるのか？

title.en: The Heavenly Demon Will Give You a Massage

altTitles.en: The Heavenly Demon Is Giving a Massage

description.en: Heaven-bound Heavenly Demon, once known as Kang Taehan, Returns to his original life after 60 years! "Ah, in such a blessed era, to be in this shape!" "Your body is screaming to be saved, haven't you heard?" The project to physically and mentally rejuvenate everyone, The journey of the Heavenly Demon Kang Taehan begins!! Weary office workers tired from alcohol and overtime, Athletes whose bodies are ruined and performance declined, Heads of families crushed by the weight of life, Modern people who have accumulated fat to withstand life’s burdens. All you modern people who are weary of their life, come and get a massage!

Sanae Kitajima is a psychiatrist specializing in end-of-life care. Her boyfriend, Takanashi, who once struggled with a deep fear of death, returns from an Amazon expedition profoundly changed. What happened during the expedition? What is the true meaning behind his cryptic words, "I can hear the whispers of angels"?

A complete manga adaptation of Yusuke Kishi's original novel, known for producing numerous masterpiece horror novels such as The Black House and Lesson of the Evil.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

title.en: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kiyoubinbou ~Party Jijou de Fuyojitsushi wo Yatteita Kenshi, Bannou e to Itaru~

altTitles.ja: 勇者パーティを追い出された器用貧乏　～パーティ事情で付与術士をやっていた剣士、万能へと至る～

altTitles.en: The Jack-of-All-Trades Kicked Out of the Hero's Party: The Swordsman Who Became a Support Mage Due to Party Circumstances, Becomes All-Powerful

altTitles.zh-hk: 泛而不精的我被逐出了勇者隊伍

description.en: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest, he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party, Orun, is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient, you need to leave." Additionally, Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None". True, he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still, he would complete every task with a skillful hand, what's more, he always performed at peak performance...! Orun, having grown frustrated, began working solo. However, deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None", an "All-Rounder"!
description.ja:
「器用貧乏」は罪なのか！？
ソツなくガンバってきたのに戦力外通告！！

勇者パーティに所属しているオルンは、ある日突然
パーティリーダーから告げられる。

「実力不足だからパーティを抜けろ」

と。

さらに、他の仲間からは「器用貧乏」と罵られるオルン。
確かに、全てが平均的で突出した能力はない。
だが、ソツなく器用にこなしていたし、何より皆には
一番尽くしていたはずなのに…！？

失意のオルンは、ソロでの活動を開始する。
しかしその胸には、究極の「器用貧乏」ーー “万能者”になる野心が秘められていた。

title.en: The Life of a Returning Officer

description.en:
Choi Jong-hyuk, captain of the intellectual crime unit, loses his mother and his own life to a mysterious mastermind for digging too deeply into a case. In his last moments, Jong-hyuk catches a glimpse of the man who kills him before waking up as his 17-year-old self.

 To prevent his mother's death, Jong-hyuk swears to hunt down the one responsible. Luckily, he has knowledge about the future and his experience as an officer.

Will these tools be enough to catch the criminal that eluded him once?
description.id: Cerita tentang Choi Jong-hyuk, ketua tim intelejen investigasi kejahatan, ketika dia ingin menemui jenazah ibunya, ia mengalami kecelakaan misterius lalu entah bagaimana dia kembali ke tahun tahun 1997.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~

altTitles.ja: 転生したら才能があった件～ 異世界行っても努力する～（コミック）

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated with Talent: I'll Work Hard Even If I Go to Another World

description.en:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.
description.ja: いくら努力しても報われない浪人生は、コンビニの女性店員とともに強盗を捕縛しようとした瞬間、異世界に転生することになってしまった。神様に“努力をしたらしただけ恵まれる才能”を望むんだところ、レベルアップに人より3倍の経験値が必要だが、確実に人より成長できる【天賦】と他者や物を鑑定できる【天眼】のスキルをもらうことになった。準男爵家の次男・マルスとして転生し、努力を重ねてステータスを伸ばしていたが、街の近くで魔物が溢れるスタンピードの前兆が見られて……。異世界転生努力ファンタジー、ここに開幕！

description.en:
Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?
*From the same author of Missing Love: The Marrying Man

title.en: The Maknae Has to Be an Idol

altTitles.pt-br: O Maknae Precisa Ser Um Idol

description.en:
"I will leave the debut group."
I can't make it in this group. I should leave and set up a chicken restaurant so that my brothers could at least make a name for themselves.
Destined to be a failed idol, I decided to leave the group for the betterment of the others.
However,
[A member dies if you leave the debut group.]
What?
"...This is making me crazy."
The struggles of Bong Tae-Yoon, the Maknae on top, whose hands hold the lives of his group members, begins now!
description.pt-br:
“Vou sair do grupo de estreia.”
Não consigo fazer sucesso nesse grupo. Eu deveria sair e abrir um restaurante de frango pra que meus irmãos pudessem pelo menos fazer um nome pra si mesmos.
Destinado a ser um idol fracassado, decidi deixar o grupo para o bem dos outros.
No entanto,
[Um membro morre se você deixar o grupo de estreia.]
O quê?
“Isso está me deixando louco.”
As lutas de Bong Tae-Yoon, o Maknae que está no topo, cujas mãos seguram as vidas dos membros de seu grupo, começam agora!

description.en: Souji Enishiro, 15 years old (high school dropout), is a controversial streamer, "Aoringo," who makes a ton of money through his violent and outrageous video content. Although he is seen as a troublemaker, in reality, he is a kind older brother who loves his younger sister and sweets. Even his controversial videos are just a means to cover the huge medical expenses for his sickly younger sister. No matter if everyone in the world hates him, he is happy as long as his sister is doing well. That is until something happens to his beloved sister...

title.en: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.ja: 転生貴族、鑑定スキルで成り上がる～弱小領地を受け継いだので、優秀な人材を増やしていたら、最強領地になってた～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Kizoku Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi wo Uketsuidanode, Yuushuuna Jinzai wo Fuyashite Itara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~

altTitles.en: As a Reincarnated Aristocrat, I'll Use My Appraisal Skill to Rise in the World: I Inherited a Weak Territory, and If I Increase the Number of Capable Personnel, It Will Become the Strongest Territory

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生貴族，以鑑定技能成名～因為繼承了弱小的領地，所以如果增加了優秀的人才，就會成為最強的領地～

altTitles.id: Terlahir kembali menjadi seorang bangsawan dengan skill penilaian
Seorang bangsawan yang bereinkarnasi, bangkit dengan kemampuan analisis

altTitles.pt-br: Como um Aristocrata Reencarnado, Usarei Minha Habilidade de Avaliação para Subir no Mundo

altTitles.vi: Quý Tộc Tái Sinh Thăng Tiến Nhờ Kỹ Năng Thẩm Định: Vì Thừa Kế Một Lãnh Địa Nhỏ Yếu, Nên Khi Tuyển Dụng Người Tài, Đã Trở Thành Lãnh Địa Mạnh Nhất
Tái Sinh Thành Quý Tộc Với Kĩ Năng "Thẩm Định"

description.en: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
description.ja: 転生し、弱小貴族として異世界を生きることになったアルス・ローベント。現代同様、異世界でも体力・知力ともに平凡だったが、“鑑定スキル”という人の潜在能力を知ることが出来るスキルを生まれつき所持していた。アルスは自分の民たちを守るため、“鑑定スキル”で弱小領地を最強の領地へと変貌させていく───！
description.vi: Sau khi được tái sinh, Ars Louvent được cho là một quý tộc yếu kém. Cả sức mạnh thể chất và trí tuệ của cậu đều ở mức trung bình ở cả 2 thế giới. Nhưng cậu sở hữu một kĩ năng độc nhất có tên ' Thẩm định' cho phép cậu có thể nhìn được chỉ số và tiềm năng của mọi người. Bằng cách tập hợp những người tài năng về bên cạnh, Ars sẽ sử dụng kĩ năng 'Thẩm định' này để khiến lãnh thổ yếu ớt của mình thành nơi mạnh nhất! Nhưng con đường phía trước của cậu sẽ không hề dễ dàng.
description.pt-br: Após ser reencarnado, Ars Louvent deve viver em um mundo diferente como um aristocrata fraco. Tanto sua força física quanto sua inteligência eram medíocres em ambos os mundos, mas aqui ele naturalmente possuía uma habilidade chamada “Avaliação” que lhe permitia ver o potencial de qualquer pessoa. Ao reunir pessoas talentosas ao seu lado, Ars usa esta habilidade de “Avaliação” para transformar seu território fraco no mais forte! Mas o caminho à sua frente não será tão simples.

description.en:
After 20 grueling years of hellish training, Juhyuk's stats are maxed-out, and he is ready to venture out into Olympus, a virtual reality game. 

His master's last dying wish is for Juhyuk to be the Ultimate Evil, the most powerful in Olympus. But when he steps out of the tutorial area, every player tries to kill him, and the game forces him to start over from Level 1! 

With these setbacks, Juhyuk will need all the help he can get to complete his SSS-rank quest and become the next Ultimate Evil.

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

title.en: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga

altTitles.en: My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered, No One in This Other World Stands a Chance Against Me!
The Other World Doesn't Stand a Chance Against the Power of Instant Death

altTitles.ja: 即死チートが最強すぎて、異世界のやつらがまるで相手にならないんですが。－ΑΩ－

altTitles.zh: 秒杀外挂太强了，异世界的家伙们根本就不是对手。 –AΩ-

altTitles.ko: 즉사 치트가 너무 최강이라 이세계 녀석들이 전혀 상대가 되지 않습니다만. –AΩ-

altTitles.ja-ro: Sokushi Cheat ga Sai Tsuyo Sugite, Isekai no Yatsu-ra ga Marude Aite ni Naranain Desuga. - AΩ -

altTitles.es: El Otro Mundo No Tiene Ninguna Posibilidad Frente Al Poder De La Muerte Instantánea

altTitles.en: My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered, No One in This Other World Stands a Chance Against Me! —AΩ—

description.en:
Growth cheats? Infinite magic power? The ability to utilize all archetypes? What’s the point if instant death ends everything with a single attack? 
 
Awaking to absolute chaos and carnage while on a school trip, Yogiri Takatou discovers that everyone in his class has been transported to another world!

He had somehow managed to sleep through the entire ordeal himself, missing out on the Gift — powers bestowed upon the others by a mysterious Sage who appeared to transport them. Even worse, he and another classmate were ruthlessly abandoned by their friends, left as bait to distract a nearby dragon. Although not terribly bothered by the thought of dying, he reluctantly decides to protect his lone companion. After all, a lowly Level 1000 monster doesn't stand a chance against his secret power to invoke Instant Death with a single thought!

If he can stay awake long enough to bother using it, that is...
description.tr:
Büyüme hileleri? Sonsuz büyü gücü? Tüm ark tipte yetenekleri kullanma yeteneği? Anında bir ölüm her şeyi tek bir saldırı ile sonlandırırsa amaç ne?  
  
Lise öğrencisi Yogiri Takatou, gezi otobüsüne saldıran bir ejderhayla uyandığı bir okul gezisine çıktı, sadece otobüste kalanlar o ve panik içindeki kız sınıf arkadaşı olan Tomochika Dannoura idi. Görünüşe göre sınıf arkadaşlarının geri kalanı, kendisini Sage(Bilge) olarak tanıtan ve ejderha yemi olarak geride bıraktı.  
  
Ve böylece Yogiri, tam olarak ne olduğu hakkında hiçbir fikri olmayan, tehlike dolu paralel bir evrene atıldı. Aynı şekilde, onları çağıran Sion, dünyasına ne tür bir varlık çağırdığına dair hiçbir fikri yoktu.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/twitydk)  
- [Japanese Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5691dd/)  
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/my-instant-death-ability-is-so-overpowered-no-one-in-this-other-world-stands-a-chance-against-me/)
description.es-la:
¿Trucos para ser más fuerte? ¿Poder mágico infinito? ¿Las posibilidades de utilizar todos los arquetipos? ¿Cuál es el punto si la Muerte Instantánea lo termina todo con un solo ataque? 

Yogiri Takatou, estudiante de último año de la escuela secundaria, estaba en un viaje escolar cuando se despertó con un dragón asaltando su autobús turístico, con los únicos que aún estaban en el autobús siendo él y su compañera de clase, Tomochika Dannoura, al parecer, el resto de sus compañeros de clase habían recibido poderes especiales por parte de Sion, una mujer que se presentó como Sabio y se escapó al mandar un dragón, dejando a los que no habían recibido ningún poder especial como cebo del dragón.

Y así, Yogiri fue arrojado a un universo paralelo lleno de peligro, sin idea de lo que acaba de suceder. Del mismo modo, Sion no tenía forma de saber qué tipo de ser había convocado a su mundo.

description.de:
Von dem Ersteller von be***l***iebten Ser***i***en wie ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto und Detergent kommt die Serie Test, eine preisgekrönte rom***a***ntische Komödie über einen Highschoo***l***-Waffenmeister namens Yugi, der die ganze We***l***t bereist und alle Life Notes sammelt, damit er eines Tages die Leiche seines Bruders bergen kann, nachdem er das Taboo erfüllt hat, den Titan, den wir an dem Tag mit seinem Stand gesehen haben, zu one-punchen und zum Nokage-Piratenkönig zu werden -datteba***y***o. Schauen Sie zu, wie er mit seinem Onii-Chan und generischen ***H***arem Mädchen durch das He***i***lige Reich von Bri***t***annia streift, während sie alle Widrigkeiten mit der Kraft der Freundschaft, ***L***iebe und... (warum knall***e***n sie sich nicht einfach gegenseitig.) In diesem Epos in Spielfilmlänge, was das von Gilgamesch und der Ilias konku***r***riert, werden wir die Mentalität und Soziologie dieser gesellschaftlichen Bedrohungen erforschen, während sie die Erde in ihrem nie stillbaren Durst nach Imoutos verwüsten.

Rezensenten geben dieser Serie eine 10/10 für die unkonventionelle Darstellung des Magical Girl Genre.
Nominiert für die 1. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den schlechtesten Manga des Jahres.
Gewinner der 2. MangaDex Auszeichnungen für den besten Manga des Jahres.
Der beste Manga aller Zeiten, wie Meichiro Noda feststellte.

---

**Hinweis:** Bitte fügen Sie *KEINE* Genre hinzu, oder der Test Manga wird die Suche verschmutzen. Weil dieser Manga die reinste Form aller Manga ist [Der Plural von Manga ist Manga].
**Fun fact:** Im Jahr 127, als dieser Manga ursprünglich veröffentlicht wurde, hieß er "Taest", aber wurde wegen den amerikanischen Druckkosten pro Buchstabe zu "Test" verkürzt.

description.en:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda

---

**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]
**Fun fact:** In the year 127, when this manga was originally released, it used to be called Taest, but because of American per/letter printing costs it was shortened to Test.

+++ hah

Chun Hajin, the strongest assassin of the Orthodox Murim’s Righteous Heavenly Alliance. Hajin loses his life as he tries to escape to find freedom.

And then…

‘The divine cult is immortal, may all demons submit. Congratulations on your recovery, third young master!’

He was reincarnated into the body of Murim’s public enemy, the third young master of the Demonic Cult?!

The conquest of the Demonic Murim by Chun Hajin, the strongest secret weapon of the Orthodox Murim, begins now.
description.ko:
정파무림 의천맹의 최강 살수, 천하진.

자유를 찾기 위해 탈출을 감행하지만 코앞에서 목숨을 잃고 만다.

그런데… 
'신교불패, 만마앙복. 삼공자님의 쾌유를 경하드리옵니다!'

description.en: Park Yun-yeong has a mysterious power which allows her to see ghastly creatures that seem to inhabit our world but not interact with it - unless they notice you acknowledge their existence. That’s when they stop being harmless.
description.pt-br: Park Yun-yeong tem um poder misterioso que permite que ela veja criaturas horríveis que parecem habitar nosso mundo, mas sem interagir com ele, a menos que percebam que você sabe que eles existem. É nesse momento que eles deixam de ser inofensivos.

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

description.en:
It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy 
to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. 
But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… 
And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.

altTitles.th: 2.5 มิติ ริริสะ

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

title.en: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me

description.en: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...
